0: Drinking a cup of water instead of a can of soda will save you 140 calories
1: Get up and walk more often, sitting for five hours is the health equivalent of smoking a pack of cigarettes
2: Walking to work will help boost your metabolism and wake you up
3: Walking 15 minutes per day will improve your health
4: Take the stairs instead of the elevator when you get to work
5: Eating an apple instead of 100 grams of chocolate will save you 500 calories
6: Aim to stand up more often, or take a quick walk or stretch break
7: Going to bed 10 minutes earlier every day will get you 70 extra minutes of sleep which will make you feel nourish
8: Save last 5 minutes of lunch break to walk around
9: Walking 15-30 minutes per day helps to prevent and control the high blood pressure that causes strokes, reducing the risk by up to 27 percent.
10: Did you know that walking also boosts your vitamin D level?
11: Walking can be also fun- take a friend and/or colleague...
